document_data.caption: Jouka in his "badger-fighting suit", alongside [[Martine]] and [[Krote]], from the cover of the novel ''[[Soldiers of Ice]]''.
document_data.name: Jouka Tunkelo
document_data.mainbody: '''Jouka Tunkelo''' was a [[gnome]] inhabiting the [[Samek Valley]] who helped defeat the [[ice devil]] [[Vreesar]] in [[1366 DR]].
document_data.Possessions: Jouka wore a strange "badger-fighting suit", which was a sort of spiked body armor. With it, he would damage enemies by embracing them.
document_data.History: Jouka was one of the few who offered help to the [[Harper]] [[Martine]] in her fight against the [[Burnt Fur tribe|Burnt Fur]] [[gnoll]] tribe led by the ice devil Vreesar.
